title: Humanitarian Supply Chain Collaboration Simulation: Strengthening Crisis Response Capabilities Through Experiential Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Utilizing smartphone-based real-time collaboration tools, emphasizing team decision-making experiences in simulated disaster scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least three information distortion factors in humanitarian supply chains
Learners can apply mathematical modeling (probability calculations, resource allocation optimization) for collaborative decision-making in resource-constrained environments
Learners can collaborate with team members to develop and present relief supply distribution plans within 48 hours in simulated disaster scenarios

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
